Title: Exp 73 NGS In-Flight Education Downlinks
Description: In-Flight Education Downlinks are opportunities for students and educators to engage with astronauts aboard the International Space Station for a twenty-minute, question and answer session. Downlinks are available to formal and informal US-based education organizations and scheduled through a competitive proposal process. The target audience is K-12 students. Title: 2024-25 NASA STEM Kids Virtual Event Group Registration: Artemis
